item.title: XAP New Silverlight Toolkit Video
item.description: XAP Todd Miranda demonstrates how to use Silverlight Themes. Watch this and other Silverlight videos on the Learn page.

item.title: XAP Seven New Community Gallery Entries
item.description: XAP Play the Silverlight Gobang Game, practice Creating Particle Effects in Silverlight, dance with a 3D Silver Mouse, and more! Find inspiration and upload your Silverlight projects to share with the community in the Gallery.

item.title: XAP 16 New Silverlight Showcases
item.description: XAP Improve your tonal memory with TwinNotes, create your own bracelets using Brighton’s Interactive Charm Builder, browse the selection of movies at Ramp DVD Store, and more in the Silverlight Showcase.

item.title: XAP Silverlight Toolkit March 2009 Available
item.description: XAP The Silverlight Toolkit March 2009 release is now available with more Silverlight controls, themes, samples and source code. This release includes faster charting, better Visual Studio and Expression Blendintegration and new layout and input controls, such as Accordion, TimePicker, DomainUpDown, Area Chart, Bubble Crème Theme, Twilight Blue Theme and many other new controls, themes and utilities.

item.title: XAP Download Silverlight 3 Beta today!
item.description: XAP At MIX09 Silverlight 3 Beta was unveiled, with over 50 new features, including support for running Silverlight applications out of the browser, dramatic video performance and quality improvements, and features to improve developer productivity. Find out more and download the beta today.

item.title: XAP Nine New Community Gallery Entries
item.description: XAP Monkey around with Face Monkey, watch the Basic Fluid Silverlight Animation, play Tetris or Sudoku, and more! Find inspiration and upload your Silverlight projects to share with the community in the Gallery.
